New Records: Milson netted a stoppage-time winner to snap Ghana's 24-year unbeaten record at the Baba Yara Sports Stadium.
Key Match Events: Milson scored a stoppage-time winner for Angola.
A fan invaded the pitch, interrupting play.
Fans vandalized seats and pitch-side boards after the game.
Post-Match Reflections: Both coaches, Otto Addo and Pedro Goncalves, expressed their disappointment in the pitch.
The unpleasant behavior of fans could attract fines for Ghana and potentially a ban if CAF deems it necessary.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch condition was poor, hindering both teams from moving the ball as desired.
